reference.title: Master host CPU and RAM resources

section.p: You can create a multi-host or single-host deployment of , on real or virtual hosts.

recommends that all production deployments include one master host and two or more delegate hosts. In this configuration, the master host runs in its own, separate resource pool, and runs only internal services. Delegate hosts run application services in other resource pools.
The master host in a multi-host deployment typically requires 4 real or virtual CPU cores and 16GB RAM. Very large multi-host deployments may require 8 CPU cores, but additional RAM is not required.

In a single-host deployment, the master host runs all internal services and all application services. The following table lists minimum resource requirements for the master host. Actual CPU and RAM requirements depend on the application and its load.

table.title: Minimum resource requirements for single-host deployments

section.note: An under-resourced master host cannot function properly. Deploy and the application it manages on a master host that meets or exceeds the combined minimum requirements.
